product_name: Gregory Tempo H1 Hydration Waistpack - 2014 Closeout
long_description: As a stand-alone training partner or a supplement to your ultra-distance shoulder pack, this hydration waistpack keeps your hydration close and essential extras handy in a low-profile lumbar design.
short_description: As a stand-alone training partner or a supplement to your ultra-distance shoulder pack, this hydration waistpack keeps your hydration close and essential extras handy in a low-profile lumbar design.
